originStory: Ameri dates from Southern Iraq are characterized by their large size, reddish-brown color, and intensely syrupy sweetness. Grown near the ancient marshlands of Mesopotamia, these dates benefit from a slightly more humid climate than other varieties, creating a softer texture and almost liquid-like sweetness. Ameri dates are perfect for those who want maximum sweetness and softness.
